desc: Take years off your keepsake photos or enhance the current ones with Photoshop CS3’s powerful tools and the expert techniques and tips you’ll find in this comprehensive guide. Using step-by-step instructions and over 500 pages of full-color examples, this book shows you how to clone, blend layers, add contrast, reduce glare, soften wrinkles, rescue torn photos, and more. From portraits to landscapes to architectural masterpieces, fine-tune your favorites with this expert guide.
title: Photoshop CS3 Restoration and Retouching Bible
